snippet: The battle over marriage equality finally lands on the Supreme Court’s docket.
abstract: Editorial contends Supreme Court, by accepting two cases challenging laws prohibiting same-sex marriage, has set the stage for the defining civil rights decision of era; calls on   court to follow shifts in public opinion and strike down Defense of Marriage Act and denial of gay people's freedom to marry.
lead_paragraph: The battle over marriage equality finally lands on the Supreme Court’s docket.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
